titles.title: Congressional Accountability and Oversight in Syria Act
To authorize assistance to conduct military or paramilitary operations in Syria, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/25/2013--Introduced. Congressional Accountability and Oversight in Syria Act - Prohibits assistance (except for humanitarian assistance) for the purpose, or which would have the effect, of promoting the capacity of any nation, group, organization, movement, or individual to conduct military or paramilitary operations in Syria, unless and until Congress expressly authorizes such assistance by law.
